original_title: Flight Characteristics of the P-51 Airplane
overview: U.S. Army Air Force pilot Bob Chilton and North American Aircraft designer Arthur Deeds show an Air Force colonel and major the new P-51B aircraft, explaining the changes in this new model and taking the plane through its paces with full description of its flight characteristics.

production_companies.name: First Motion Picture Unit, United States Army Air Forces

title: Flight Characteristics of the P-51 Airplane
